turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, hi. I want to place a pickup order from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to get three small pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get two of the vegie lovers and one of them extra thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want thin crust on both?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just on the extra tees on.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. So, that's two veggie lovers and then one thin crust extra cheese small pie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have 3 small pizzas, 2 veggie lovers with thick crust. and the other is extra cheese with thin crust. correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. When will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set. your pizzas will be ready for pickup soon at bela luna's.
